messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] I came across this today
messages.msgSnippet: Julie,  Isn t this so true.. Oh and I wanted to tell you that you are living my dream--goat,animals....pecan trees! Wow. Do you guys make goat cheese?  I
messages.messageBody:
Julie, Isn't this so true..
Oh and I wanted to tell you that you are living my dream--goat,animals....pecan trees! Wow.
Do you guys make goat cheese? I really want to try that, and maybe mix it with cows milk.
Kelli T
Julie Stauffer wrote:"And if you would know God be not therefore a solver of riddles.
Rather look about you and you shall see Him playing with your children."
----Kahlil Gibran


Just thought it was cool.

Julie

messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] I came across this today
messages.msgSnippet: I love Kahlil Gibran.  Did you read what he says on children.  It starts off with Your children are not your children but they are the sons and the daughters
messages.messageBody:
I love Kahlil Gibran. Did you read what he says on children. It starts
off with "Your children are not your children but they are the sons and
the daughters of life's longing for itself." It is a must read in the
Prophet. Lisa

-----Original Message-----
From: Julie Stauffer [mailto:jnjstau@...]
Sent: Saturday, September 21, 2002 9:15 PM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] I came across this today

"And if you would know God be not therefore a solver of riddles.
Rather look about you and you shall see Him playing with your children."
----Kahlil Gibran


Just thought it was cool.

Julie

"And if you would know God be not therefore a solver of riddles.
Rather look about you and you shall see Him playing with your children."

Just thought it was cool.

Julie
